name: Mineral Foundation
description:
To shop Sirena Cosmetics Click here: <a href="http://sirenascosmetics.mysupadupa.com/collections/finishing-veils-illuminating-glows/products/mineral-foundation-30-gram-sifter-jar"> Sirena Cosmetics Web Site

Loose powder mineral foundation is great and beneficial for those with oily, combination and problem skin, such as acne and rosacea . This foundation is matte, lightweight and does not feel heavy, will not clog your pores. My foundation offers medium to full coverage, as you can layer it to get the coverage you want and still have a natural beautiful look. 

Does not contain bismuth, talc, corn starch or preservatives. 

Great for sensitive skin and all skin types. Offers exceptional coverage for minor imperfections, but feels light on the skin. 

Comes in a 30 gram sifter jar, filled with approximately 9 grams of product.

Ingredients: mica, titanium dioxide, zinc oxide, kaolin clay, magnesium myristate, active colloidal botanicals, iron oxides

name: Pink Petal for Cheeks Loose Powder Mineral Blush
description:
To see Sirena Cosmetics' entire line go here:  <a href="http://sirenascosmetics.mysupadupa.com"> Sirena Cosmetics Site

Pink Petal for cheeks is a light to medium pink shade with some shimmer.  Comes in a 20 gram sifter jar.

Pink Petal is a delicate soft pink matte shade. It has a neutral tone, working well with both warm and cool complexions. Very little is needed in order to achieve results. 

Full size- 6g in a standard 20g sifter jar 

Ingredients: mica, australian ivory clay, kaolin clay zinc oxide, magnesium myristate, iron oxides

name: Raspberry Ice Loose Mineral Eye Shadow
description:
For more eye shadow choices go here:  <a href="http://sirenascosmetics.mysupadupa.com/collections/eye-shadows/products/raspberry-ice-mineral-eye-shadow"> Sirena Cosmetics Site

Raspberry Ice loose mineral eye shadow is a beautiful light raspberry shade with a nice subtle shimmer.

NET WEIGHT: Approx. 1 gram

JAR SIZE: 5 gram with sifter.

INGREDIENTS: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide, Australian Ivory Clay, Kaolin Clay, Magnesium Myristate, Iron Oxides


Leonoras Cosmetics offers 100% handcrafted mineral makeup! I personally handcraft each and every product you see here in my etsy shop. You will never find repackaged or private labeled cosmetics. My mineral makeup is 100% All Natural so you know you are getting high quality products knowing that its pure and free of any perfume fragrances, synthetic dyes, and preservatives . Everything is handmade from cosmetic grade minerals. Leonoras Cosmetics' mineral cosmetics have an infinite shelf life. Leonoras Cosmetics also never ever tests on animals.

Mineral eye shadows can be applied dry or wet. By adding a little water for a more dramatic look.
